DOC.brief_summary: In Siriraj Hospital, colistin alone for treatment of MDR A. baumannii contributed to mortality 45% Fosfomycin is an antimicrobial which has activity against gram-negative bacterial including MDR A. baumannii In this study, we compare the clinical and microbiologicalresponse of colistin alone versus colistin plus fosfomycin in treatment of A. baumannii infected patients
DOC.brief_title: Colistin Versus Colistin Plus Fosfomycin for Infections Caused by MDR Acinetobacter Baumannii
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion criteria - Age> 18 years - Hospitalized to Siriraj Hospital - Infected caused by A. baumannii - Need Colistin treatment Exclusion criteria - Pregnancy or Lactating mother - Colistin or Fosfomycin Allergy - Patients who have severe abnormal renal or liver function
